author: Dominic Alling
description: Named after the capital city of Trinidad, the home of Angostura Bitters, and fittingly this cocktail calls for a monster half an ounce of bitters. Despite this, it is incredibly easy to drink, particularly as an after-dinner digestive.
name: Port of Spain (by Dominic Alling)
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Angostura or other aromatic bitters

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
